summary: Hermes is a Greek god known as the messenger and herald of the gods. He is fast and can travel between the mortal and divine worlds. Hermes protects travelers, thieves, and speakers. He is often shown with winged sandals and a helmet, carrying a staff called a caduceus, which has two snakes wrapped around it. Hermes is also linked to commerce, like the Roman god Mercury. He is a trickster, as told in the Homeric Hymn, and is the son of Zeus.
title: Hermes
